The application provides you with a service to automatically capture the location and send a text message to your contacts.
\n\nDeveloped and maintained by Afzaal Ahmad Zeeshan.

You can use the application service in the following steps:
 
 	 1. Add the contacts to your application. It is in the menu on home page.
 	 2. Adjust the time and location values.
 		 * Set up the minimum time (in minutes) after which application must check for your current location.
 		 * Set up the minimum meters travelled to trigger the SMS service.
 	 3. Remember to enable the service.
 
 
Should you require any assistance, feature or want to submit a bug report, let me know on Google Play. 
Thank you.
